title: Eurocode 6 Masonry Shear Wall Design Calculator

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \( V_d = f_v \times A_v \) where \( V_d \) is the design shear resistance, \( f_v \) is the shear strength, and \( A_v \) is the area of the wall.
